body:
@7 Eyes Mashiraga Aki draws out the shock factor to subvert the same inane plot. Rape -> "breaking me" during the act -> follow the rapist  bcz why not ,for some pseudo intellectual gobshit.
He is good at writing the subplots so the issue gets unnoticed
Ah ai think I figured it out, it’s not the author but a series of authors who write these NTR plots under the title. Search Toranoana Haru in the search box.
This says NTR Hen, is there also a vanilla Hen too? Or some other alternate route?
Yeah , of course , if your brain logic is with five years old child logic in NTR , that's your problem , that recaptcha ,..

the people down there that were arguing three months ago , the plot is fine without problem , she got drugged in coffee and he fucked her and took the video , after that was like that , i see no problem here concerning with plot ..
Only morons would question the logic of porn and try to apply real lfie logic to it

Artists Like: Miyabi, Homunculus and others for vanilla.

Mashiraga Aki and some others for ntr

Vanilla and Ntr have the most basic, uninspired plots by far but you should only give a rats ass for the fap worthiness of the art. If you want something with a little more, you'll have to try hard to sift thru the basic stuff

@Ecchinosuke 
The only one who's getting dumb here for sure is you, or more like - you were never smart to begin with.
This is one of the most common and classic "plots" for ntr genre and it's been there for fucking what, 15-20 years?
The real question is - why'd you even try to project the fucking imaginary porn world into a real fucking world rules. LoL

So she gets rape and the guy makes a video to blackmail her, and instead of calling the police she accepts the terms of not doing anything and just let it get worse. NTR is really getting dumb or more important the fans of this crap are getting dumb.
Did she was blackmailed just for that photo? Ntr is more dumb everyday...
Im sure than this work will be translate very soon because is NTR. MIZONE last work delay for monts.
